sourcesContent: import {Component} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: `app.component.html`, styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { answers = [{ type: 'yes', text: 'да' }, { type: 'no', text: 'нет' }] submitForm(form: HTMLFormElement) { console.log('Submited!', form) } }
